comment: This response contains a complete result set with no more pages
This is a response with invalid XML
This is a response with a few dropped records
This response does not include all of the optional attributes in the content element
This has no results at all and is technically invalid XML according to the schema but we support it anyway because this is the default behavior of the BioCASe software
This is a response which has more pages following it
This has exactly the same content as the partial_results.xml file but different attributes in the biocase:content element. This is to check if the hashing works correctly
